summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the purchase of three properties, 10735 and 10745 Stone Avenue North and 10720 Midvale Avenue North, Seattle, for a storm drainage system and other utility and general municipal purposes, and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts; and amending the 2010 Adopted Budget, including the 2010-2015 Capital Improvement Program (CIP) by shifting existing appropriations and revising project allocations for certain projects in the 2010-2015 CIP.
